TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CacheEntryRemovedCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub CacheEntryRemovedCallback(arguments As CacheEntryRemovedArguments)

param.name: arguments
param.span: Información sobre la entrada que se quitó de la memoria caché.

span.span: The information about the cache entry that was removed from the cache.

summary.span: Define una referencia a un método al que se llama una vez quitada de la memoria caché una entrada.

span.span: Defines a reference to a method that is called after a cache entry is removed from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El delegado pasa información sobre la entrada de la memoria caché quitada en forma de un objeto.The delegate passes information about the removed cache entry in the form of a object.
